item.title: Glass on cycle path, road and pavement, 22nd July
item.description:
Since Friday 18th July - There is a large amount of broken glass distributed around the road, pavement and cycle path starting from the corner of the pub/hotel carpark, extending across the road and back along the cycle path

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree Delapena, 22nd July
item.description:
Dead tree needs felling. The tree is dangerous to walk under with pushchair. It is located behind Delapena / 3 St Lawrence Court on the public footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, St Lawrence Court, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: The Bin was not collected from lat two months., 21st July
item.description:
The food waste bin is full from long time. Is very heavy to move is filling with other rubbish and blocking the pavement. Please can you dispose this bin is not belong to residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Saint George's Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking on corner of motershead drive - gray close junction, 21st July
item.description:
Cars are continually parking on the corner of gray close and motershead drive junction causing obstruction to my driveway. It makes it very difficult for me to get my van on my drive to avoid parking it on the road causing an obstruction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottershead Drive, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
